item.title: CVE-2023-33189|2023-05-30T05:39:45.132Z -- pomerium -- pomerium
item.description: Pomerium is an identity and context-aware access proxy. With specially crafted requests, incorrect authorization decisions may be made by Pomerium. This issue has been patched in versions 0.17.4, 0.18.1, 0.19.2, 0.20.1, 0.21.4 and 0.22.2.
